name: Soul Fighter (itch) (Skolye)
description:
1 VS 1 Fight games on the same keyboard :)

One-on-one fighting games have been a popular video game genre for many years. They are characterized by intense, close-quarters battles between two characters, each with different abilities. Players must use a combination of tactics and techniques to defeat their opponent. 1-on-1 fighting games are often played in single player mode or online against other players, providing an exciting and competitive gaming experience. Some of the most popular games in this genre include "Street Fighter", "Mortal Kombat" and "Tekken". All in all, 1-on-1 fighting games are exciting entertainment for those who love fighting and competition
